Speaker.name: Octavia_Sad
Speaker.line1: What possibly take you so long, dear?
Speaker.line2: I was so immersed in prayer that I almost forgot about you.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: 'Negative feelings only serve to weaken the connection to the Divine.'

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: For its sake, I will refrain myself from getting upset with your delay.

Choices.Choice1: Play along to agree with her

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line2: I'm grateful for your kindness, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: You are a good man, indeed.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy2
Speaker.line1: Do you think what you've chosen will be to my liking?

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Yes, ma'am. I'm sure they will.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Happy
Speaker.line2: That's what I like in men.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Sad
Speaker.line2: I must say I have high expectations for you.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: Please set the tray here, and I will be the judge.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line1: I hope this will be worth the time you've spent.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line3: My time is valuable, dear waiter.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Sad
Speaker.line1: Let's not waste any more of it.

Speaker.name: Octavia_Normal
Speaker.line2: I hope this will be worth the time you've spent.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: [You served the meal and begin brewing the tea for Lady Octavia.]
